maqras.text: 41|47|Guanyu fuhuo shi de renshi, zhi guiyu ta; guoshi de tuo e, nuxing de huaiyun he fenmian, wu yi buzai ta de dong jian zhong. Zai na ri, ta jiang wen tamen:“Nimen wangcheng wei wo de huoban de, zai nali ne?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Women baogao ni, women zhong jue meiyou yige ren neng zuozheng zhe jian shi.”
41|48|Tamen shengqian suo qidao de, jiang huibi tamen, tamen jiang quexin ziji wu suo tao zui.
41|49|Ren qifu bu yan, yi zao huohuan jiu huixin juewang.

41|50|Ta zaoyu huannan zhihou, ruguo wo shi ta changshi cong wo jiangxia de enhui, ta biding shuo:“Zhe shi wo yong gongzuo huan lai de. Wo buxin fuhuo shi hui daolai. Ruguo wo bei zhao qu jian wo de zhu, ze wo zai ta nali bi shou zhi shan de baochou.” Wo bi jiang bu xindao zhe de xingwei gaosu tamen, wo bi shi tamen changshi yanzhong de xingfa.
41|51|Dang wo shi en yu ren de shihou, ta wang'en er zi da; dang ta zaoyu huohuan de shihou, ta qidao bu jue.
41|52|Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Ruguo “gulanjing” shi cong an la nali jiang shi de, er nimen bu xin ta, name, you shei bi changyuan weibei zhenli zhe geng mi wu ne?”
41|53|Wo jiang zai sifang he zai tamen zishen zhong, ba wo de xuduo jixiang zhaoshi tamen, zhidao tamen mingbai “gulanjing” que shi zhenli. Nandao ni de zhu neng jianzheng wanwu hai bugou ma?
41|54|Zhen de, tamen dique huaiyi jianglai shifou yu tamen de zhu huimian. Zhen de, ta que shi zhouzhi wanwu de.
42|1|Ha yi, mi mu.
42|2|A ni, xi ni, ga fu.
42|3|Wanneng de, zhi rui de an la, zheyang qishi ni he ni yiqian de zhong xianzhi.
42|4|Tiandi wanwu dou shi ta de; ta que shi zhigaowushang de, que shi zhi da de.
42|5|Zhu tianti jihu cong shangmian polie, zhong tianshi zansong tamen de zhu, bing wei dimian shang de ren qiurao. Zhen de, an la que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.
42|6|She an la er ze qu baohu zhe de ren, an la shi jianshi tamen de, ni jue bushi tamen de jianhu zhe.

42|7|Wo zheyang qishi ni yi ben alabo wen de “gulanjing”, yibian ni jinggao shou yi ji qi sizhou de jumin, yibian ni yugao hao wuyi yi de jihe ri. Yibufen ren jiang zai leyuan zhong, yibufen ren jiang zai liehuo zhong.
42|8|Jiaruo an la yiyu, ta bi shi tamen xinfeng tongyi zongjiao, dan ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe ru yu ta de enhui zhong; bu yi de renmen, jue wu baohu zhe, ye wu yuanzhu zhe.
42|9|Tamen zenme she ta er ze qu bie de baohu zhe ne? An la cai shi baohu zhe, ta neng shi sizhe fuhuo, ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de.
42|10|Wulun nimen zhenglun shenme shi, dou yao gui an la panjue. Na shi an la, shi wo de zhu, wo zhi tuo kao ta, wo zhi guiyi ta.

42|11|Ta shi tiandi de chuangzao zhe, ta yi nimen de tonglei wei nimen de qizi; shi nimen de shengchu tonglei xiangpei; ta jie ci shi nimen fanzhi. Renhe wu dou bushi xiang ta. Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de.
42|12|Tiandi de baozang, zhishi ta de; ta yu shi shei de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu; yu shi shei de jiyang jiongpo, jiu shi ta jiongpo; ta shi quanzhi wanwu de.
